2204.subject: BIO
2204.descrlong:
The major outcome of this capstone is for a student to study for and satisfactorily complete an approved standardized test that has a biology focus.  Students can take the DAT, OAT or MCAT, or GRE subject exam in Biochemistry and Cell Biology or Biology, or one of approved Biology sections of the CSET.  The choice in exam is dependent upon a student's career goals.   

(Prereq:  BIO 300 or ENVS 300 or MSCI 300 or ENSTU 300)
